General.Name: Seven Principles AG
General.Description: Seven Principles AG provides digital business implementation support services in Germany and internationally. It offers agile transformation services, including consulting and coaching; technological transformation, comprising Assessment and planning, Cloud infrastructure automation & platforms, and CI/CD as a service and pipeline configuration; designs, plans, builds and operates private networks based on the technologies, such as 5G, SDN, and cloud; system integration, process digitalization, and development of individual solutions; digitalizing administration; security services; international compliance consulting services; and 7P-EMM, an European software for secure management of smartphones and tablets with local managed services. Seven Principles AG is headquartered in Köln, Germany.
